intro: Survive the wild, enjoy the quiet, fear the squirrels.
description:
Camp Life: Wilderness Survival 2025 drops you off in the great outdoors and lets you figure it out from there. No hand-holding, no shortcuts—just nature, your gear, and whatever you make of it.

Set up camp, cook over open flames, explore dense forests, and brave unexpected weather. Whether you're hunting for food, gathering supplies, or just trying to keep your fire from going out, survival is in your hands.

Customize your camper, craft tools, and adapt to changing conditions. Some days are peaceful, others are unpredictable—but every moment feels earned.

Forget the Wi-Fi. Learn to pitch a tent.
And if the raccoons steal your food… well, that’s on you.
